Title: Hannibal Rising
Genre: Adventure, Crime, Drama, Horror, Thriller, War
Actors: Aaran Thomas, Gaspard Ulliel, Li Gong, Helena-Lia Tachovská
Plot: After the death of his parents during World War II, young Hannibal Lecter moves in with his beautiful aunt and begins plotting revenge on the barbarians responsible for his sister's death.
Country: UK, Czech Republic, France, Italy, USA
Production: Quinta Communications, DeLaurentiis Productions, Zephyr Films, Ingenious Film Partners
